title: List of Delta Sigma Theta sisters
data: Television writer and producer ; Creator of Girlfriends and The Game
Grace Award Winning Co-host of the nationally syndicated Matt and Ramona Show based in Charlotte , NC . Producer and co-host of The Satisfied Life
Emmy-Nominated News Anchor at NBC-10 in Philadelphia ; Former MSNBC anchor and correspondent
News Anchor at WSOC-TV in Charlotte , NC
Emmy Award Winning News Anchor at WLS-TV in Chicago
Radio and television producer and a political activist . National Council of Negro Women board member and organizer of Wednesdays in Mississippi
TV Producer , Writer , Former Co-Creator of Moesha
Emmy Award Winning Reporter 9 Eyewitness News ( CBS )
Current Radio Disc Jockey for WHUR 's 96.3
News Anchor at NewsChannel5 at 6pm anchor position in Cleveland ; Former 1st Female and African-American host of Academic Challenge ; Interviewed Oprah Winfrey
News Anchor at WUSA9 in Washington DC ; Vice President of Media Outreach ; the 1st DC market female news anchor
Africa Bureau Chief for Essence Magazine ; Journalist on CNN
Award Winning Journalist and Reporter at NPR - National Public Radio 's National Desk
Daybreak Anchor at Wood TV-8 in Grand Rapids , Michigan
Current news contributor for The Tom Joyner Morning Show ; former anchorwoman on BET Nightly News ; former co-host of the radio show The Steve Harvey Show

Emmy Award Winning Casting Director ( The Tuskegee Airmen & Malcolm X ) who has been a major contributor to the success of over 30 films , including eight with director Spike Lee ( Malcolm X ) . TV credits include Bill Cosby 's A Different World and LL Cool J 's In the House
News Anchor at KSLA 12 TV in Louisiana
News Anchor at WTTG Fox-5 in Washington , D.C
intro: Below is a list of Delta Sigma Theta members (commonly referred to as Deltas). Delta Sigma Theta Sorority, Incorporated (ΔΣΘ) was founded on January 13, 1913, at Howard University. Delta Sigma Theta Sorority, Incorporated was first incorporated in Washington, D.C., on February 9, 1913. On January 20, 1930, the organization was incorporated as a perpetual body. The nomenclature of graduate chapters are named according to geographic location and Alumnae annexed to the service area's name.
